channel.title: [317] [PI] Blessed-City [PI] [317]
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/1zlread.jpg[/img]
[b]Credits:[/b] - Blessed - OverloadX (For Source) - Nividia
[b]Server: 317, Project Insanity[/b]
[i][b]Applications:[/b][/i] - 24/7 Hoster [0/1] (Extremely In Needed!) - Server Coder [1/2] (Extremely In Needed!) - Webclient Coder [0/1] (Extremely In Needed!) - Graphic Designer [1/3] - Website Coder [1/2]
[u][i][b]Copy This:[/b][/i][/u] Name: E-Mail: Experience: Age: Apply For: What can you do for us?:
[b]Hello, Everyone. Started up this project like 2 weeks ago. Now am i looking for some help. I am in needed of some [u]Experienced Coders[/u] and some nice Graphic Designers.
[u]Something about myself:[/u]
- Who am I?: I am Jelle and I am 14 years old and coding around the 2 years. - What do i want to reach with this topic?: I want to have my dream team to start up one of the best Rsps around! - Why i need you?: I need you because i can't do this alone. I am not the best coder around so i am searching for some help. - How can you contact me?: U can contact me with Sending [i][u]PM'S[/u][/i] or with adding my [u][i]Msn.[/i][/u] - My msn: Jelle_psv@msn.com[/b]
- Server Feature's:
Not much to say but we have: - Dungeonering skill - Edge Home - Ingame Highscores - Some costum items Like : Chaotics, Dragon Claws, Primal, Korasi - Dungeonering Point System. - Donor Ranks - Donar Zone - Donator Cape And much more <3
Server Picture''s:
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/607/allespicture.png/][IMG]http://img607.imageshack.us/img607/7518/allespicture.png[/img][/URL]
[URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/807/allespecs.png/][IMG]http://img807.imageshack.us/img807/9577/allespecs.png[/img][/URL]
[u][i][b]EDIT: Sorry for the bad grammer :o[/b][/i][/u]

[b]Hello, Everyone.
Started up this project like 2 weeks ago. Now am i looking for some help. I am in needed of some Experienced Coders and some nice Graphic Designers.

                                      [u]Something about myself:[/u]

  • Who am I?: I am Jelle and I am 14 years old and coding around the 2 years.

  • What do i want to reach with this topic?: I want to have my dream team to start up one of the best Rsps around!
